div.bibl: Daily Jewish Courier, May 11, 1917. FOR THE RUSSIAN REVOLUTION

body.p: A banquet in honor of the Russian Revolution and the liberation of millions of Russian Jews is a real obligation. Sunday is the proper date, and the banquet of good food, good music, and addresses by Dr. E. G. Hirsch, Gov. Bomberger, of Utah, and other great personalities will certainly innoculate inspiration to celebrate the Russian Revolution and the redemption of our people.
